metadata.name: DeepAgent Patterns
metadata.description: DeepAgent framework patterns including unified reasoning, memory folding, task planning, and subagent delegation

unified_agentic_reasoning.description: Single stream of thought with autonomous tool discovery and usage
unified_agentic_reasoning.key_concept: Agent maintains one coherent reasoning thread while dynamically discovering and using tools
unified_agentic_reasoning.implementation_pattern: Agent uses a single prompt with tool descriptions, autonomously decides when to use tools based on task needs

memory_folding.description: Brain-inspired memory architecture with episodic, working, and tool memory

episodic_memory.description: Long-term storage of past experiences and conversations

working_memory.description: Short-term active context for current task

tool_memory.description: Memory of tool usage patterns and results
tool_memory.implementation: Cache of tool calls and outcomes
tool_memory.use_case: Optimize tool selection and avoid redundant calls

task_planning.description: Breaking complex tasks into discrete steps with progress tracking

context_management_via_files.description: Offload context to file system to prevent overflow
context_management_via_files.key_concept: Store large context in files, reference them instead of keeping in memory

subagent_delegation.description: Spawning specialized subagents for context isolation and parallel execution
subagent_delegation.key_concept: Main agent delegates subtasks to specialized subagents with isolated context

long_term_memory.description: Persistent memory across conversations using LangGraph Memory Store

best_practices: Use memory folding to manage context efficiently
Implement task planning for complex objectives
Use subagents for parallel execution and specialization
Use semantic search for memory retrieval
Compress old memories to save space

title: Deepagent patterns Knowledge

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Patterns are verified through automated testing.
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: The user maintains control over all generated output.
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: All automated actions are logged and verifiable.
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Strict safety checks prevent destructive operations.
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Uniform patterns ensure predictable system behavior.
